Lots of restaurants and shops in the same avenue downwards. Walking trails at a block distance. Nice sunsets from the upper part of the parking lot.

description: Flat parking next to the civil guard barracks, nearby there is a gym with spa (15 euros / day), bars, lidl, Mercadona, ...

title: (28693) Quijorna - 2 Calle Nabera
description: Very large free public parking for any type of AC, Camper etc.. close to restaurants and supermarket, drinking water source. hiking trails with civil war monuments. Good BTT and motorcycle routes.

title: (28048) Madrid - M-612
description: Small parking site with picknick table and a beautiful view. to have a relaxed day and enjoy nature or the tasteful restaurant at the other side of the road.

title: (28035) Madrid - 5 Calle de Cándido Mateos
description: Next to the soccer field, near the Antonio Machado subway to hear downtown. Quiet area, there is noise when they play football but at night it is quiet to sleep. there are always motorhomes parked.

title: (28012) Madrid - 54 Calle de Atocha
description: Pretty good looking laundy. Finding a parking place is almost impossible but a bit further it is managable. As of no nut sure about the opening hours since a sheet of paper blocked the times (8-22:00)

title: (28939) Arroyomolinos - 31 Calle Madrid
description: A quiet place next to the sports center, overnight without any problem. Next door there is a civil guard barracks.

title: (28600) Navalcarnero - 51 Calle de las Suertes
description: Two areas with picnic tables around a children's play area. It has a drinking water source and you can park well.

title: (28041) Madrid - 24 Calle Campotéjar
description: Car park at the Orcasitas commuter train station, free and with direct access to the commuter train three stops from the city center (Sol station). Perfect to leave the car in the outskirts and go visit the city. Enough space for motorhome

title: (28048) Madrid - Carr. Somontes al Palacio de la Real Quinta
title_short: (28048) Madrid - Carr. Somontes al Palacio de la Real Quinta
description: Land parking with roofed area and without roof. Some tables scattered around. Roads with routes. Nearby there is a restaurant. Possibility of visiting the Palacio de la Quinta.

address.street: Carr. Somontes al Palacio de la Real Quinta

title: (28048) Madrid -
description: Pothole dirt parking. Area with tables spread around. Do not make fire. Several routes to enjoy hiking through Mount El Pardo.

title: (28035) Madrid - 155 Calle Valle de Enmedio
description: Quiet, next to a police station with two subway lines nearby, fountain. Ideal for visiting the city.

title: (28039) Madrid - C. Miramelindos
description: Good parking. very central in Madrid and without too much noise. During the morning he is busy with workers...

title: (28907) Getafe - 10 Carretera Madrid - Toledo
description: Washing room for motorhomes with a walkway that helps to reach the top of the car, although to wash the roof is a bit complicated, I had to climb the railing to reach it.

title: (28048) Madrid - 2A Carretera Colmenar Viejo
description: A large, flat, sandy parking area not far from the palace, dam and reservoir, with shade for cars but little for taller vehicles. The more than 40 picnic tables suggest that it gets crowded in the summer. Good for walking, including steps to the river. It can be windy, with little shelter. Clean and quiet. There is no lighting.

title: (28943) Fuenlabrada - 1 Calle de Creta
description: Area with some flat places along the road, where you can park to visit Fuenlabrada.

title: (28048) Madrid - 1D Calle Almenas
description: Close to the center, along a busy road, but there are currently several campers, parking is officially not allowed along the (quite quiet) road with a park next to it.

title: (28035) Madrid - 37 Calle Valle de Enmedio
description: Free 10 minutes from the metro to go downtown with one change. Residential area.

title: (28905) - 9Q Poligono Vp. Buenavista
description: Parking area in the surroundings of a new and quiet neighborhood (Cerro Buenavista). Views of central Madrid and access on foot to a park with a lake, several children's play areas and various shops. Next to a supermarket SaveMas. In the area with views of Madrid, it is somewhat inclined, but if you turn left at the roundabout, it is much better, right in front of a meadow of grass.

title: (28049) Madrid -
description: Together Suburban Station and Metro de Pitis. Ideal to go to the center (Puerta del Sol) of Madrid in 5 stations, in Cercanías (constant trains). also on line of Metro 7. With three bus stops: 49 to Pza de Castilla, 64 A Glorieta de Cuatro Caminos and 82, to Moncloa. You can spend the night in any of the many streets in the area or in the free parking of the station. Quiet zone. With quick exit to the M40. It is a great residential area. Good Bar Restaurant on the terrace of the station.

title: (28600) Navalcarnero - 4 Calle de Camilo José Cela
title_short: (28600) Navalcarnero - 4 Calle de Camilo José Cela
description: A simple parking lot in the middle of the houses. You hear street noise. There are no services, but the place seems safe even if it is absolutely charmless. It's certainly not a place to spend the day, but for an overnight stop if you arrive late, it's fine.

title: (28970) Humanes de Madrid - 6 Avenida de la Industria
title_short: (28970) Humanes de Madrid - 6 Avenida de la Industria
description: Washes very well, platform on the roof

title: (28600) Navalcarnero - Unnamed road
description: Quiet place next to institute

title: (28939) Arroyomolinos - Unnamed Road
description: A quiet place, in the pine forest to spend the night

title: (28944) Fuenlabrada - 1 Plaza de Alua
description: To wash and dry clothes, market next door

title: (28041) Madrid - 34 Calle de González Feito
description: Good place to stay 4 the night. Just the closest spot to M30 inner circle and proper place if going to a festival in the Enrique Tierno Galván Park (i.e. tomavistas). just an urban place to park during the day and stay at night, for free in Madrid (which is not easy).

title: (28903) Getafe - C. Madrid
description: Large free parking at the train station.

title: (28970) Humanes de Madrid - 4 Avenida de las Flores
title_short: (28970) Humanes de Madrid - 4 Avenida de las Flores
description: Gas station with washing machine for motorhomes with a pressure water gun has a walkway and you can clean the roof of the motorhome, it also has repsol bottles

title: (28041) Madrid - 9B Calle Joaquín Soler
description: Parking next to the metro and the caja mágica

title: (28950) Moraleja de Enmedio - 18 Camino la Dehesa
title_short: (28950) Moraleja de Enmedio - 18 Camino la Dehesa
description: Parking next to the sports courts. Very wide, quite level. The noise from the power station is barely audible. The road at night is little traveled. The parking lot lights stay on.

title: (28041) Madrid - 90 Camino de Perales
description: Hundreds of public parking spaces next to the apple tree park. at night in September it was mostly empty. trees for shade, quiet area. drinking water point within the park. AC is not expressly prohibited but neighbors are not disturbed, I do not think they come to disturb vans / AC.

title: (28020) Madrid - 20 Calle del General Margallo
description: Great laundry. The owner, Roberto, available on the mobile for any questions or concerns. Very nice. He is also president of the Tetuán triathlon club. All your information on map.

title: (28950) Moraleja de Enmedio - 1E Arroyo Caño
description:
Aparcamiento gratuito en vía pública. Los aparcamientos no son muy amplios, por lo que es más para furgonetas pequeñas/medianas que para autocaravanas o Camper de grandes dimensiones.
Al lado está el centro de Salud, hay un restaurante y un supermercado.
Tranquilo para pasar la noche. Aunque por la mañana hay trasiego de coches.

title: (28905) Getafe - s/n Avenida Adolfo Suárez
description: Spacious parking near a park and within walking distance of a metro station. Little traffic . Didn't stay overnight here. There is a bar next to the car park, so there is social control. It might be busy here on a Sunday afternoon.

title: (28903) Getafe - 11 Calle Rosa Luxemburgo
description: Parking of the soccer field. Quiet. We have spent the night without problem.

title: (28035) Madrid - 46 Avenida del Ventisquero de la Condesa
title_short: (28035) Madrid - 46 Avenida del Ventisquero de la Condesa
description: Free parking area, quite flat, during the busy day but very quiet nights and weekends, without services, but next to a gas station with all services. Valid to sleep peacefully one night.

address.street: 46 Avenida del Ventisquero de la Condesa

title: (28045) Madrid - 5 Calle Estrella Denébola
description: Public parking with blue zone, 4h 8.20e, at night without payment.

title: (28041) Madrid - 1 Avenida de Andalucía
description: Exterior parking of the Carrefour supermarket, quiet and safe. Everything went well. Calm and quiet place.

title: (28946) Madrid - s/n Camino de la Vega
title_short: (28946) Madrid - s/n Camino de la Vega
description: If you need to make a stop on the way to TOLEDO, it is a good place, always leaving it as it is. A few meters gas station and municipal swimming pool. La Pollina recreational area, with excellent 3 game parks for the little ones. Picnic areas, soccer field and basketball. Free public toilets. Very flat area, with no slope or height, width or length limitations.

title: (28600) Navalcarnero - 21 Calle de los Cástines
description: Great place to park and rest. It is just a short walk to the historic center. Quiet, spacious, and well-kept parking area. It has a 24 hour gas station right next door. And also a supermarket. Not many cars usually pass by and it allows you to rest well.

title: (28045) Madrid - 13 Calle Villarrobledo
description: Quiet and central location, bus, metro and train very close, next to the municipal police.

title: (28600) Navalcarnero - 11 Calle de los Charcones
description: Laundry next to a Mercadona, quite well located

title: (28600) Navalcarnero - 10X Paseo del Alparrache
description: Parking of the bullring, quite flat, very central, 5 min to the town square. It has a park next door, 4 restaurants, the medical center opposite, a laundry and a motorhome workshop.

title: (28002) Madrid - 165 Calle de Serrano
description: Parking 600m from the football stadium in the blue zone. 4 hours maximum allowed

title: (28904) Getafe - 26 Avenida Reyes Catolicos
description: Parking day and night, without services, near the highway, near the Miguel Hernández school. There is a fountain and several parks. At night, very quiet. Next to the Metro station and near the city center. In Calle Madrid there are plenty of great places for having beer & tapas.

title: (28600) Navalcarnero - 5 Calle de San Cosme
description: Quiet and flat place

title: (28007) Madrid - 47 Calle de Juan de Urbieta
title_short: (28007) Madrid - 47 Calle de Juan de Urbieta
description: Good place and very close to the Retiro Park, the center, the subway station, etc ... We have only been one night, there were people passing by and some cars with which the place was somewhat safer, to visit Christmas is great . ps: it is a blue zone but we do not pay when you come on weekends and holidays

title: (28034) Madrid - 24 Calle Sangenjo
description: Laundry. It has washers of up to 15 / 18Kg and dryers. Banknote exchange machine for coins.

title: (28600) Navalcarnero - 31D Calle de la Estrella
description: Clay parking near the historic center of Navalcarnero and good restaurants.

title: (28053) Madrid - 3 Calle del Monte Perdido
description: There are more like two parking lots during the day and at night it is good to leave the vehicle safe because it is quite colorful but not for sleeping, there are garbage cans the Ibis next door, Burger King, KFC, it is next to the Puente de Vallecas metro to sun in 4 or 5 stops. If you have a gym basic fit there is one and you can shower

title: (28034) Madrid - 11F Avenida del Monasterio de El Escorial
title_short: (28034) Madrid - 11F Avenida del Monasterio de El Escorial
description: Lavadel Self-Service Laundry Montecarmelo

address.street: 11F Avenida del Monasterio de El Escorial

title: (28053) Madrid - 3 Calle de las Palomeras
description: Self-service laundry 3 washing machines, two dryers and washing station for pet clothes/blankets

title: (28034) Madrid - 6L Avenida del Santuario de Valverde
title_short: (28034) Madrid - 6L Avenida del Santuario de Valverde
description: Parking on the street, next to the garden area and runnig track

name: Camping San Juan
title: (28210) Camping San Juan
description: Camping San Juan in valdemorillo. Located on a hill near the road. Nearby there are swamp and routes. Not many shadows

address.street: 97 Carretera a la Urbanización Pino Alto

title: (28046) Madrid - 2A Calle Tulipan
description: Free gravel parking used by locals. It's a little hard to find the right entry. It seems unregulated but everybody uses it and you won't get a ticket. The entry roads are VERY bumpy with lots of potholes, it gets better inside the parking and it's worth it, you won't find a free parking as well situated in Madrid. It's very close to one of the main train stations (CHAMARTIN) and bus stations (PLAZA DE CASTILLA) and there are bars and supermarkets all around. It's also unusually silent for it's location appart from the rush hours where people parks in our out to go to work/home. I asked around and everybody said that it was a very safe place to park as well.

title: (28046) Madrid - 300 Paseo de la Castellana
description: Parking area green / blue free from 8pm and weekends. It is very close to the Chamartin metro and train station and the Plaza de Castilla bus and metro station. There is a market nearby, as well as bakeries, bars and other services. There are good views of the four towers but it is a bit noisy area being close to the Castellana.

title: (28028) Madrid - 79 Avenida Toreros
description: Next to the Plaza de Toros de Las Ventas. Urban transport and the city nearby. Parking closed on bullfighting days.

title: (28906) Getafe - 6E Calle de Bachiller Alonso López
title_short: (28906) Getafe - 6E Calle de Bachiller Alonso López
description: Residential area next to the polygon, climbing wall a few meters away, a very safe and pleasant place to sleep, it is parking on the street so cars pass by, it is undeniable but still very good. Dog and children's park and bars and terraces very close. But above all, a very safe area.

title: (28034) Madrid - 10 Calle Condestables
description:
A free and fairly quiet car park both during the day and at night.

A 10 minute walk from a metro stop. And by bike 10 minutes from the Castellana.

Highly recommended for old or unlabeled campers, since they cannot enter the m30 and interior of Madrid, due to the environment.

There are no parking lots so close and free around the city.

The only drawback is that it has quite a few holes in the ground, be careful with the bass, although going slow is no problem.

title: (28028) Madrid - 3 Calle de Roberto Domingo
description: Blue zone parking, from 9:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m., Saturdays and Sundays free. In August until 15:00 the blue zone. Next to the Las Ventas bullring. Many parking lots and easy entrance, although there is an uneven area.

title: (28970) Humanes de Madrid - Unnamed Road
description: In the middle of nature fountains to fill up water .dust bins quiet nights.lake with ducks and turtles

title: (28053) Madrid - 231 Ronda del Sur
description: Parking is prohibited on Sundays and holidays from 8 a.m. to 5 p.m. per market, normally empty esplanade ideal for spending the night in front of the linear park of entrevias

title: (28210) Valdemorillo - 6 Camino Robledo de Chavela
description: Parking next to the bullring

title: (28049) Madrid - 40 Calle Monasterio de Silos
description: Parked here for 1 week. Metro stop right next to it. Safe area. Bars and Shops around.

title: (28600) Navalcarnero - 4 Calle de los Siete Picos
title_short: (28600) Navalcarnero - 4 Calle de los Siete Picos
description: Normal parking, isolated from noise and good views, with almost no traffic and with houses nearby. We feel safe and cool.

title: (28600) Navalcarnero - 1 Diseminado Camino Agua Riaza
description: Prairie of San Isidro, meadow with small trees and small shadows, is usually quiet but can coincide with some celebration, since there are swings, barbecue area and fountains. Discard coming in the week of San Isidro (May 15) there is a fair all week and it is impossible to park

title: (28038) Madrid - s/n Calle de Ramón Pérez de Ayala
title_short: (28038) Madrid - s/n Calle de Ramón Pérez de Ayala
description: Public fountain, garbage and public WC.

address.street: s/n Calle de Ramón Pérez de Ayala

title: (28038) Madrid - 10 Calle de Ramón Pérez de Ayala
title_short: (28038) Madrid - 10 Calle de Ramón Pérez de Ayala
description:
In this street there are usually large parking spaces next to Parque de las Tetas (Cerro del Tio Pio), from where you have magnificent views of Madrid and the sunset. It has no shade and is not flat.
There is a free public toilet next door.
There are also several fountains, one of them in the children's area next to the viewpoint bar, although there are several more throughout the park. Next to it there are also some calisthenics bars to exercise.
It is in the Vallecas neighborhood, so relatively close you can find all kinds of establishments. It is about a 15-minute walk from the Nueva Numancia metro, which in 10 more minutes leaves you in the center of Madrid.

address.street: 10 Calle de Ramón Pérez de Ayala

title: (28033) Madrid - 22 Calle Pedro Salinas
description: Quiet area where you can leave the motorhome and spend the night, has no services, but there are shops, supermarkets, parks, bus stops, restaurants.  Nearby (you can walk to all of them).

title: (28018) Madrid - 2 Calle Historias de la Radio
title_short: (28018) Madrid - 2 Calle Historias de la Radio
description: Laundry with 5 washers and 3 dryers. You do not need detergent.

name: Camping ALPHA Madrid
title: (28906) Camping ALPHA Madrid
description: Camping Alpha Madrid, shaded ground, access Madrid center by bus.

title: (28033) Madrid - 4 Calle de Julia Balenchana
description: It is a quiet cul-de-sac so you can spend the night without hearing a lot of noise. There are no houses on the street, just some kind of convent and the street is practically dead. down the street and to the right there is a fountain. down the street and across there is a park. more or less nearby there are some shops

title: (28053) Madrid -
description: Parking in the train of the well little traveled, admits any vehicle is quiet if you would sleep here

title: (28053) Madrid - 103 Calle Reguera de Tomateros
description:
Large paved but very simple parking lot without limited signage in the immediate vicinity of various sports facilities. 300 m from El Pozo train station and from there suburban trains to Madrid Atocha train station.
Shade morning or afternoon depending on location.

title: (28984) Parla - 4 Avenida Torres Quevedo
description:
Large parking strip at Decathlon. is new area under development. Fine to spend the night.
Quiet area.

No service.

title: (28017) Madrid - Avenida de las Trece Rosas
title_short: (28017) Madrid - Avenida de las Trece Rosas
description: Large car park of the Almudena cemetery, no services, to visit Madrid.

title: (28050) Madrid - 11 Calle del Arroyo de Valdebebas
title_short: (28050) Madrid - 11 Calle del Arroyo de Valdebebas
description: Perfect place to sleep, a little noise from cars, but the truth is that very quiet, 50 meters from a bus stop, we were 3 days without problems of any kind, quite flat in some parking spaces.

title: (28031) Madrid - 81 Calle de Luis I
description: Gas station low cost, with pressure washing where they are suitable for motorhomes, we have seen no faucet. Everything is self-service, there is a vending machine for snacks but there is no WC. Good price of fuel.
